Reviews.Title: Great Camera and lenses
Reviews.Author: Fuzzycoach
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase.  Extremely happy with everything about it.  would highly recommend. Can't wait to try some Shots of Milky Way.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon EF 70-300mm IS USM Lens + <3> PD DSLR Sling Backpack +
<4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <5> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <6> Battery Grip for Canon 6D + <7> Spare LP-E6 Battery +
<8> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <9> 58mm UV Filter + <10> 77mm UV Filter + <11> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Screen Protectors + <15> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 6D Digital SLR Camera Body with EF 24-105mm L IS USM & 70-300mm IS Lens + 64GB Card + Backpack + LED Flash + Grip + Battery & Charger Kit
